summary: A "documentary" about the major influence that a '60s rock singer named Bruno has had on rock music, as attested to by such rock legends as Ringo Starr, Brian Wilson and the Bee Gees, among others.
cast: Bruce Willis|Ringo Starr|Jon Bon Jovi|Dave Chamberlain|Clive Davis|Elton John|Henry Diltz|Bill Graham|Dick Clark|Grace Slick|Joan Baez|John Berry|Graham Nash|Stephen Stills|Phil Collins|Jerry Behrens|Kathleen Beaton|Bobby Colomby|Don Cornelius|Irene Crinita|Cherry Currie|Herbie Drys|Tom Dyer|Marty Fera|Johnnie Fiori|Michael J. keywords: rock music|musician|spoof|independent film|character name in title
title: The Return of Bruno
